SEARCH
Package graph

Class SortAgent

java.lang.Object
graph.SortAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Agent
public class SortAgent extends Object implements Agent
Represents an agent that sorts a list of numeric values received from an input topic and publishes the sorted list to an output topic.

The SortAgent subscribes to an input topic to receive a comma-separated list of numeric values, sorts these values in ascending order, and publishes the sorted list to an output topic.

  • Constructor Details

    • SortAgent

      public SortAgent(String[] subs, String[] pubs)
      Constructs a SortAgent that subscribes to the specified input topic and publishes the sorted list to the specified output topic.

      The agent subscribes to the input topic specified in the subs array and publishes the sorted list to the output topic specified in the pubs array.

      Parameters:
      subs - an array containing the names of the input topics
      pubs - an array containing the names of the output topics

      public void reset()
      Resets the list to an empty array.

      This method initializes list to an empty array.

      Specified by:
      reset in interface Agent

    • callback

      public void callback(String topic, Message msg)
      Processes a callback by sorting the list of numeric values and publishing the sorted list.

      If the topic corresponds to input, the list is updated with the new values. The values are then parsed, sorted in ascending order, and published to the output topic.

      Specified by:
      callback in interface Agent
      Parameters:
      topic - the name of the topic from which the message was received
      msg - the message containing the comma-separated list of numeric values

    • close

      public void close()
      Unsubscribes from the input topic and removes this agent as a publisher from the output topic.

      This method ensures that the agent no longer receives updates or sends messages to the topics it was associated with.

      Specified by:
      close in interface Agent

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this SortAgent to another object for equality.

      Two SortAgent instances are considered equal if they have the same input topic and output topic.

      Specified by:
      equals in interface Agent
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to be compared
      Returns:
      true if this agent is equal to the specified object, false otherwise
